amendment.description: An amendment to reduce Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide by 10 million and increase funding for Defense Health Program by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: Amendment reduces funding for Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide by $10 million and increases funding for Defense Health Programs by a similar amount in order to address Gulf War Illness.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Grayson.
